pages.text: Each Vault Hunter starts their adventure at $(l)Vault Level 0$().$(br2)Vault Experience is gained by performing $(l)actions$() inside of $(l)Vaults$().$(br2)The maximum Vault Level reachable is $(l)Level 100$().$(br2)Starting at $(l)4 Vault Levels$() above the Vault's level, an $(l)penalty$() for $(l)experience$() is applied.

pages.title: Vault Burgers
pages.text: Vault Burgers can be $(l)consumed$() to gain Vault Experience.$(br2)The $(l)more ingredients$() used to craft the Burger, the $(l)more Vault Experience$() is gained.
